snippet: The blast is the most recent in a series of assaults targeting mosques in the kingdom, with the timing often intended to maximize casualties.
abstract: Saudi Arabian state news reports suicide bomber killed at least 15 people in mosque in southwestern region of Asir, including 12 Saudi police force members; Islamic State claims responsibility.
lead_paragraph: The blast is the most recent in a series of assaults targeting mosques in the kingdom, with the timing often intended to maximize casualties.

headline.main: At Least 15 Die at Saudi Mosque from Suicide Bomber
headline.print_headline: At Least 15 Die as Bomb Hits Saudi Mosque

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
